sense.def:
Kadar nekaj
swings
ali kadar nekdo
swings something
, se tisto večkrat premakne nazaj in naprej ali v levo in desno od točke mirovanja.

seg.quote: He sat there swinging his legs.
She walked with an exaggerated swing of the hips.

sense.def:
Kadar nekaj
swings in a particular direction
, se premakne v določeno smer v širokem loku.

seg.quote: I pushed the door and it swung open.
Boylan swung the bag on to the back seat.
...a grand, impatient swing of his arm.

sense.def:
Kadar človek ali vozilo
swings in a particular direction
, se nenadoma obrne v določeno smer.

seg.quote: He swung his car out of the side road.

gramGrp.pos:
VB
with or without
OBJ,
with
ADJUNCT

sense.def:
To swing at someone or something
pomeni poskušati udariti nekoga ali nekaj.

seg.quote: I swung at him and hit him forcefully.
The soldier swung a slow, heavy right hand at Tom.

sense.def:
A swing
je sedež, ki visi s kovinskega okvirja ali drevesa na dveh vrveh ali verigah. Nanj lahko sedemo in se gugamo.

A swing in people's opinions or attitudes
je precejšnja sprememba mnenj ali stališč ljudi.

seg.quote: There was a 16.2% swing to the Social Democrats.

sense.def:
Kadar nekaj, na primer javno mnenje ali razmerje moči,
swings in a particular direction
, se spremeni.

seg.quote: The balance of power had swung decisively in favour of the moderates.

sense.def:
Kadar je nekaj
in full swing
, deluje s polno silo in ni več na začetni stopnji.

cit.quote: v polnem zamahu, z vso silo

sense.def:
To get into the swing of something
pomeni začeti se ukvarjati z nečim in uživati pri tem;
